original_title: Alberto Barros - Tributo A La Salsa Colombiana
overview: An homage to the music of his native roots, Tributo a la Salsa Colombiana is the first of two volumes featuring reworkings of Latin American classics from Grammy-nominated trombonist Alberto Barros. Released in 2007, it features vocals from Joe Arroyo, Wilson Saoko, and Charlie Cardona and includes the hit single "La Palomita."
title: Alberto Barros - Tributo A La Salsa Colombiana
